product_name: DC Search Boa Snowboard Boots - Women's - 2013/2014
long_description: Warm and lightweight, and featuring the easy-to-use Boa(TM) lacing system for a dialed-in fit, the DC Search Boa Snowboard are what you want for exploring the entire mountain. Boa(R) H3 Coiler lacing system, with ankle and cable guides along entire edge of eyestays, distributes closure force evenly for a dialed-in fit that won't loosen up. The Coiler scoops up loose cable when entering and exiting the boot; put your foot in, pull back on the tongue, twist the reel a few times and you're off. EVA memory foam liners feature fleece linings for lasting warmth; lace closures let you snug the liners around your feet; low-profile EVA footbeds enhance board feel. Unilite outsoles provide durability, damping and cushioning; snow-shedding traction tread ensures sure footing.
short_description: Warm and lightweight, and featuring the easy-to-use Boa(TM) lacing system for a dialed-in fit, the DC Search Boa Snowboard are what you want for exploring the entire mountain.
